EmailTemplate.name: Assigned Task - National Manager
EmailTemplate.subject: Task - Review {!Customer_Scoping_Questionnaire__c.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello ,
This task has been assigned to you. https://auspost.my.salesforce.com/{!Task.Id}
Once you have completed the task, please update the task status to "Finished".
Thanks,
Salesforce Team
